title: Fortinet Warns of Active Exploitation of FortiOS SSL VPN 2FA Bypass Vulnerability
description: Fortinet on Wednesday said it observed "recent abuse" of a five-year-old security flaw in FortiOS SSL VPN in the wild under certain configurations.
